description: Try our easy to follow Porcini Bruschetta With Truffle Oil recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Porcini Bruschetta With Truffle Oil Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices country bread, cut into thick
1 tbs extra virgin olive oil (for drizzling)
3 tbs flat-leaf parsley, chopped (save 1tbs to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the bread slices on both sides under a preheated medium broiler or in a preheated ridged griddle pan or over a barbecue. Rub 1 side of each toasted slice with the bruised garlic, then drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with the parsley.
Pick over the porcini and brush off any grit. Remove the stalks and thinly slice. Slice the caps as thinly as possible.

Cut the toasted slices in half. Sprinkle with the sliced porcini stalks, drizzle with a little lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Cover with the sliced porcini caps. Drizzle with more lemon juice and a little truffle oil, season again with pepper, and garnish with a little chopped parsley. Serve immediately.
